Bellevue.University of Washington College of Engi:
The University of Washington College of Engineering (CoE) is the engineering unit of the university. In autumn 2017, the CoE had an enrollment of 8,125 students.


== History ==
The College of Engineering was established in 1901 after the University of Washington's Board of Regents hired and appointed Almon H. Fuller as professor of Civil and Mechanical Engineering three years earlier.
